metadata.dc:author: Esteban Sánchez, T
Redondo Luciáñez, E R
Rodríguez Herrero, D
Calero del Castillo, J B
Galindo León, A
metadata.dc:description: We have studied a 67 years old woman suffering from a 40 years evolution Pleomorphic adenoma. The specimen weighed 250 g, and showed several areas displaying carcinoma. This report confirms the relationship between long-term evolution and malignant transformation.
metadata.dc:title: Tumor maligno sobre adenoma pleomorfo de larga evolución a propósito de un caso.
[Malignant tumor upon pleomorphic adenoma of long development, a case report].
